__e: Uh, no, because actually, I'm still mad at you.
But what I don't understand is that after six years, you don't know me well enough to know that, yeah, I would be really mad at you, but then I'd be really happy for you.
Mother would be very upset with you!
Look, I, I hear what you're saying, Debbie, but, I, I don't think that today is the best day to, "starve the beast."
I guess... sensing a beast again for the first time in a very long time... it made me feel like I used to, before you, before us.
Sensing a beast again for the first time in a very long time, it made me feel like I used to.
'Cause I am also a beast myself.
She saw me and appeared frightened, as if I were a wild beast.
What did you feel when you fed a man live to a wild beast?
Yeah, let's have a little less "beast" and a little more "man."
You didn't ask to become a beast, and you haven't done anything wrong-- in fact, you've done nothing but good ever since, and that's why I've been there for you, why we've all been there for you.
Hopefully, eliminate one of our problems. But we don't even know what he wants to do with a beast, and whatever it is, it can't be good.
Only if you're the beast that I hope you are.
What if I can't control my feelings, what if I turn back into that beast I once was.
I'm sad to be going, because I came here to prove to myself that I still can be the old beast that I used to be.
Still, now we know who Braxton's beast is after, and saving him might be the only way to save...
Pretty sure this guy knows a beast is after him.
